header.text: My friend Maui - a bit very clumsy ragdoll cat. I am a little jealous of his naps during the day, but You know what? I wouldn’t switch with him! I like biking and short trips to the mountains with my boyfriend too much.

education.title: Education
education.text: I graduated my design studies from the University of Science & Technology and, at the Academy of Fine Arts. Being exposed to such a wide variety of teachings, has allowed me to look at design from a number of different perspectives, where I can apply both beauty and usability to my approach and skill.

volunteering.title: Volunteering
volunteering.text: For a number of years, I was heavily involved as a Scout Guide for The Polish Scouting and Guiding Association. As the coordinator for the associations team leaders, I was responsible for, and oversaw the implementation and management of courses and workshops. Including delivering teaching on interpersonal communication and team building. But my fondest memories are of our summer camps with the Brownies group, which I was the leader of.
volunteering.textadd: From myFrom my time and participation with the Association, it has equipped me to be able to work in a group environment. And that through team building and cooperation, every problem can be solved!
